bearer_token.title: Authentication Bearer Token
bearer_token.description: The bearer token used for authenticating with WebSSH API / MCP server. You can find it in your WebSSH settings.

server_port.title: API / MCP Server Port
server_port.description: The port on which the WebSSH API / MCP server is running. Default is 1985.
